_x0031_.name: StuG IV

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 10 players on your team by experience earned • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_.name: LT-1: For Victory!
_x0031_.hint: Still, try to avoid face-to-face combat. Instead, try to hit enemies in the side or rear. Observe where the enemy vehicle's gun is pointing and approach from the other side.
_x0031_.description: At lower tiers, some light tanks have almost as much firepower as heavier vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Spot 2 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_.name: LT-2: Reconnaissance
_x0032_.hint: But to spot a few enemy vehicles and get destroyed in the process would be a waste of your valuable tank. A good scout can spot enemies while successfully staying alive.
_x0032_.description: One of the main objectives of light tanks is to spot enemy vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 2 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0033_.name: LT-3: The Pursuit
_x0033_.hint: Always try to flank the enemy and hit them from the rear, where the armor is weakest. Do not linger in one spot. If you change positions frequently, the enemy will have a hard time hitting your vehicle. Remember that light tanks have the same chance of being detected while on the move as when they are stationary.
_x0033_.description: Your light tank has enough speed to quickly cross the map and provide support to your allies where your help is needed.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 1 track

secondary.conditions: • Destroy the track of an enemy vehicle. Your allies must cause damage to the vehicle immobilized by you

_x0034_.name: LT-4: A Forced Halt
_x0034_.hint: To destroy a track effectively, target the drive wheel at the front or rear of the suspension. Remember that even if your gun is incapable of penetrating the armor of an enemy vehicle, it can always destroy the track. HE shells are best suited for this purpose. You will receive more experience if your allies cause damage to enemy vehicles immobilized by you.
_x0034_.description: Destroy a track of an enemy vehicle, thus immobilizing it and exposing it to the fire of your teammates’ more powerful guns. When you destroy a track of an enemy vehicle you temporarily immobilize it. This will help you and your allies to take better aim.

primary.conditions: • Spot 1 vehicle and assist your allies in destroying it

secondary.conditions: • Spot enemy vehicles and enable your allies to cause damage to 2 vehicles spotted by you

_x0035_.name: LT-5: The Forward Observer
_x0035_.hint: Once you have spotted an enemy, keep it under observation long enough for your teammates to take aim and fire. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the spotted vehicle by selecting "Requesting fire at…" from the Command Menu.
_x0035_.description: At the higher tiers, light tanks are very vulnerable to enemy fire. Do what light tanks are made to do: spot enemy vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause damage to 2 vehicles by spotting them or destroying their tracks

secondary.conditions: • Enter a battle with the Coated/Experimental Optics or Binocular Telescope

_x0036_.name: LT-6: Battle Support
_x0036_.hint: The longer your view range, the better. Try to spot enemy vehicles and hit their tracks while keeping yourself alive. Equipment such as Coated Optics and Binocular Telescope can help you to spot the enemy from a safe distance.
_x0036_.description: Damage caused with your assistance is one of the most important statistics for light tanks. If this statistic is high, that means you were an asset to your team in battle.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage to an enemy SPG

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0037_.name: LT-7: The SPG Hunter
_x0037_.hint: Taking out enemy artillery is not easy. Wait until your teammates have gotten the enemy's attention, and then rush to the enemy SPGs. When you engage them, try not to cross in front of their guns. Instead, hit them from the sides and rear.
_x0037_.description: Artillery is a priority target for light tanks. Destroying enemy SPGs will greatly increase your team's chance of victory.

primary.conditions: • Participate in the successful capture of a base or reset the enemy capture points of your/neutral base • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0038_.name: LT-8: Get Out of Our Base!
_x0038_.hint: If you are not 100% positive that your shells will penetrate the invader’s armor, load a High-Explosive shell instead. HE shells have a greater probability of causing damage to the enemy vehicle. Remember, all it takes is 1 HP of damage to the enemy vehicle or a damaged module to reset the capture points of your base. When you are attempting to capture a base, try to avoid enemy fire as much as possible.
_x0038_.description: In the heat of battle, it is easy to forget about the defense of your own or the neutral base. Such imprudence may allow the enemy to gain the upper hand and seize the objective rapidly. Remember, your tank has enough speed to break contact and retreat to defend the base and fend off the invaders with precise shots or a daring ramming attack, thus saving your team from an imminent defeat.

primary.conditions: • Spot an enemy vehicle while remaining unspotted

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0039_.name: LT-9: Hawk-Eyed
_x0039_.hint: Upgrading your turret may improve your view range. This will help you to spot enemy vehicles long before they get close.
_x0039_.description: Light tanks are the eyes of their team. They help to spot enemy vehicles and keep them visible during the battle.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 3 players on your team by experience earned

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_0.name: LT-10: The Best Result
_x0031_0.hint: A good scout knows when to be cautious and when to be aggressive. Stay alert to the flow of battle.
_x0031_0.description: The more effective you are in a battle, the more experience you will earn. Show them what a light tank is capable of!

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 4 times to enemy vehicles that are of the same tier as your vehicle or higher by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by shooting them

_x0031_1.name: LT-11: A Fair Fight
_x0031_1.hint: High-tier light tanks can carry significant firepower. On the one hand, your gun may be inferior to the gun on a heavy tank, but, on the other hand, your gun will probably penetrate a heavy tank's rear armor quite nicely.
_x0031_1.description: The higher the tier of your light tank, the more firepower you get, in addition to your speed, view range, and stealth.

primary.conditions: • Spot enemy vehicles and enable your allies to cause 250 HP of damage to vehicles spotted by you. Remain unspotted at the moment when the damage is caused

secondary.conditions: • Enter a battle with the Camouflage Net and corresponding camouflage

_x0031_2.name: LT-12: The Ghost
_x0031_2.hint: Once the enemy spots you, you will have to stay constantly on the move. But if you have not yet been spotted, find a position in a bush where you can stay concealed while lighting up the enemy. Equip your tank for stealth beforehand.
_x0031_2.description: Good concealment increases your chances of survival in battle. Light tanks have great concealment abilities, thanks to their relatively low silhouettes.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 1,000 HP of damage • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_3.name: LT-13: The Key to Victory
_x0031_3.hint: If you join a battle as part of a Platoon, make sure that you have solid voice communication among your Platoon members. This will help to save the time you usually spend typing messages in Chat.
_x0031_3.description: Victory is easier to achieve when you are part of a Platoon, and even more so when your tactical unit is well coordinated. While you are distracting the enemy and relaying their position, your Platoon members will cause damage to targets spotted by you, bringing your team one step closer to victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 1,500 HP of damage

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_4.name: LT-14: The Battle Watch
_x0031_4.hint: The more experienced players fighting alongside you in battle, the higher the combat efficiency of your team. Greatly increase the team's effectiveness by entering a battle in a Platoon. Alternatively, you can play alone if your are confident that you have high enough skill and that your allies will not let you down.
_x0031_4.description: A light tank in a coordinated Platoon can spell disaster for the enemy team. Platoon with vehicles that complement your playstyle: you might want to go into battle platooned with SPGs, or you may prefer a fast-moving pack of light tanks. Do not be afraid to experiment with different lineups. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Damage caused and damage caused with your assistance must total 3,000 HP

secondary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause damage to 4 vehicles by spotting them or destroying their tracks • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_5.name: LT-15: The Aggressive Recon Specialist
_x0031_5.hint: You are not a bull in a china shop. There is no need to break through right away. Be patient, choose your moment, and appear where the enemy is not expecting you. Your advantages are your speed, maneuverability, and view range—use them wisely. Do not forget that your vehicle also has a gun.
_x0031_5.description: It's time to show the enemy what a real light tank can do!

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0031_6.name: HT-1: Debut
_x0031_6.hint: You will encounter other heavy tanks with very thick armor. Learn to aim at their thinner plates and at weak spots.
_x0031_6.description: The guns of heavy tanks are powerful, but still benefit from skillful aim.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle from a distance of 100 m or less

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0031_7.name: HT-2: Point Blank Shooting
_x0031_7.hint: The effectiveness of the Sniper mode significantly decreases when the enemy vehicle is getting closer. Sometimes it is better to switch to Arcade aim by pressing Shift or using the mouse wheel.
_x0031_7.description: Even in the most heated battle, your tank can destroy the enemy and survive.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles of different types

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0031_8.name: HT-3: Omnivorous
_x0031_8.hint: Every type of vehicle employs its own unique tactics on the battlefield. For example, medium tanks can easily outflank opponents, heavy tanks will most likely meet enemies head-on, and tank destroyers will prefer to position themselves on hills or hide behind bushes.
_x0031_8.description: Prove that your tank can destroy an enemy vehicle of any type.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an internal module or injure a crew member

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_9.name: HT-4: Hit Them Where It Hurts!
_x0031_9.hint: You can immobilize an enemy vehicle by hitting its engine, while just one precise hit to the ammo rack of a vehicle can give you the upper hand in the most difficult duel. Internal modules are the turret ring, engine, fuel tanks, ammo rack, and radio.
_x0031_9.description: You must know not only your own tank, but your opponents' vehicles as well. Carefully study the vehicles that you are likely to encounter in battle and hit their weak spots.

primary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to vehicles within the view range of your vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0032_0.name: HT-5: Target Acquired!
_x0032_0.hint: Constantly evaluate the situation on the battlefield. Often it is better to retreat from a disadvantageous situation, so you can cause more damage later.
_x0032_0.description: Leave your enemy no chances by hitting them at the first opportunity. Every successful hit brings your team one step closer to victory.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy heavy or medium tanks

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_1.name: HT-6: A Two-Course Meal
_x0032_1.hint: As for medium tanks, you should be wary of their speed and maneuverability, as they usually avoid direct combat. Always monitor the minimap to quickly react to a medium tank's unexpected arrival.
_x0032_1.description: Most heavy tanks have extremely thick armor on the front. If you cannot flank them, try hitting the spots where the frontal armor is the thinnest. Weak spots usually include hatches, observation devices, the commander's cupola, and the lower glacis plate.

primary.conditions: • Participate in a successful capture of a base or reset the enemy capture points of your/neutral base • Cause 500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0032_2.name: HT-7: I've Got It Covered
_x0032_2.hint: Be careful when approaching the enemy base—get ready for a "warm" reception. If you prefer defensive tactics, make use of the terrain to find the best concealment and vantage points, which you can use to defend your own base (or the neutral base in an Encounter Battle) against the approaching enemy.
_x0032_2.description: Heavy tanks are great for breakthrough tactics. Punch through the enemy defensive lines and capture their base. However, do not underestimate your enemy—they might employ the same strategy.

primary.conditions: • Cause 500 HP of damage to enemy heavy tanks

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0032_3.name: HT-8: With Guns Blazing
_x0032_3.hint: As a heavy tank, you are the backbone of your team. Enemy heavy tanks are just as important. Take them on and try to destroy them first, or at least keep them busy for as long as possible.
_x0032_3.description: Remember, your armor is your key strength. Cause as much damage as possible while your opponents enjoy the non-penetration messages over and over again.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle by ramming it

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0032_4.name: HT-9: A Crushing Blow
_x0032_4.hint: The driver's Controlled Impact skill and the Spall Liner equipment can significantly reduce the damage done to your vehicle by ramming, and, at the same time, increase the damage of your own ramming attacks.
_x0032_4.description: Close-quarters engagements often render you unable to reload in time. In this situation, finish an enemy off by ramming them! The weaker the enemy vehicle's armor at the point of impact, the more damage you will cause.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 3 players on your team by damage caused

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_5.name: HT-10: A Weighty Argument
_x0032_5.hint: The heat of battle is exactly the time when your tank can show all it is worth. Your great armor protection, if used efficiently, will ensure survival even in an almost hopeless situation. The longer your tank survives in a battle, the more damage you can cause to the enemy.
_x0032_5.description: Keep your gun active and keep yourself alive as long as possible.

primary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • At the end of the battle, have no injured crew members or damaged/destroyed internal modules

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0032_6.name: HT-11: Not Even a Scratch!
_x0032_6.hint: Use a First Aid Kit or a Repair Kit if the enemy destroys a key module of your vehicle or injures a crew member.
_x0032_6.description: Every module destroyed and crew member injured can become a problem. Try to keep them as safe as possible when breaking through the enemy ranks.

primary.conditions: • Have total damage blocked by armor equal to or exceeding the hit points of your vehicle • Cause 500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0032_7.name: HT-12: Sturdy Armor
_x0032_7.hint: As much as possible, present your front armor to the enemy and hide your flanks and weak spots. Angle your armor to increase its effectiveness.
_x0032_7.description: Your armor can block a great amount of damage if you use it well.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle during the first 3 minutes of the battle

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_8.name: HT-13: Storm the Defense!
_x0032_8.hint: When playing as part of a Platoon, protect each other’s flanks and focus your fire on the enemy. Keep each other alive, tear into the enemy, and find a way to win the battle.
_x0032_8.description: A Platoon of well-coordinated heavy tanks can turn the tide of the most desperate battle. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles of 2 different types

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_9.name: HT-14: Take that Hill!
_x0032_9.hint: Coordinate with your teammates and cover as much of the battlefield as possible with destructive fire.
_x0032_9.description: Destroy all types of enemy vehicles, stop them cold, and leave them with no hope of victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Cause, receive, and block a total of 4,000 HP of damage

secondary.conditions: • Cause 20% of the total amount of damage caused by your team • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0033_0.name: HT-15: Tempered Steel
_x0033_0.hint: Act carefully. Survive! Try to protect your side and rear armor from enemy fire. Heavy tanks can carry almost every battle, that is why they are always high-value targets for enemy SPGs. Keep a cool head and do not let them pin you down.
_x0033_0.description: A heavy tank can hit hard, but it can also take a hit and keep battling. Engage the enemy and keep the pressure on.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 10 players on your team by experience earned • Cause damage to an enemy vehicle • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0033_1.name: MT-1: First Steps
_x0033_1.hint: Hit the enemy at any opportunity, but try to avoid their fire as well.
_x0033_1.description: At lower tiers, most medium tanks can take on any other type of vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 6 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0033_2.name: MT-2: Good Hit!
_x0033_2.hint: The penetration chance marker on your reticle shows the chance of penetrating the enemy vehicle at a particular point. A red marker indicates no chance of penetration, a yellow marker indicates a low chance of penetration, a green marker indicates a high chance of penetration. Try to aim at the sides or the rear of enemy vehicles. Look for their weak spots.
_x0033_2.description: Every successful shot brings your team one step closer to victory. However, it is not always easy to land a solid hit on an enemy vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage during the first 2 minutes of the battle

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0033_3.name: MT-3: The Spearhead
_x0033_3.hint: Move aggressively to get behind the enemy lines and make a commotion there, putting the opposing team at a disadvantage.
_x0033_3.description: Medium tanks are maneuverable vehicles with impressive guns.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 1 track by shooting • Cause damage to an immobilized enemy vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an immobilized enemy vehicle

_x0033_4.name: MT-4: Stay Still, Would You?
_x0033_4.hint: Aim for the drive wheels, the sprocketed wheels at the front or rear of the suspension. Once immobilized, an enemy tank is an easy target. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the target vehicle by selecting "Requesting fire at…" from the Command Menu.
_x0033_4.description: Destroying an enemy's track can leave them vulnerable to more shots from you or your allies.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage to an enemy light tank

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0033_5.name: MT-5: Counter-Reconnaissance
_x0033_5.hint: Do not let enemy light tanks achieve their main objective! Prevent them from spotting and immobilizing the vehicles of your teammates.
_x0033_5.description: One of the objectives of medium tanks is to destroy light tanks.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage to vehicles of 3 different types

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0033_6.name: MT-6: Rapid Fire
_x0033_6.hint: Your tank combines mobility and firepower: use them both. You can help your teammates on one flank, then retreat to the base to protect the SPGs, and then suddenly strike the enemy from the rear—all in one battle.
_x0033_6.description: Medium tanks are flexible and able to achieve a variety of objectives on the battlefield.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage to an enemy SPG by shooting

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0033_7.name: MT-7: A Surprise Blow
_x0033_7.hint: Enemy artillery can cause heavy damage to your teammates. Break through a flank, rush to the enemy base, and neutralize their SPGs.
_x0033_7.description: Enemy SPGs are high-priority targets for you. Neutralize them to get your team one step closer to victory.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 3 times to enemy medium tanks by shooting them • Cause 300 HP of damage to enemy medium tanks

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0033_8.name: MT-8: Confrontation
_x0033_8.hint: Focus on the vehicles of your tier or higher. A fight against strong opponents will help you sharpen your skill with medium tanks, as well as receive more valuable rewards after battles.
_x0033_8.description: Destroy same-tier enemy vehicles or vehicles of a higher tier to significantly contribute to the victory of your team.

primary.conditions: • Cause 300 HP of damage to enemy heavy tanks • Destroy an enemy heavy tank

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0033_9.name: MT-9: A Worthy Opponent
_x0033_9.hint: Outflank enemy vehicles, shoot them while concealed, target their weak spots to pick them apart—whatever it takes. Remember that heavy tanks are slower than you, and their turrets have low traverse speeds.
_x0033_9.description: Seeking and destroying enemy heavy tanks is a hard task to accomplish but very beneficial to the team's cause.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 2 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0034_0.name: MT-10: A Versatile Warrior
_x0034_0.hint: Your vehicle is maneuverable. Try exploiting this advantage to outflank enemy vehicles and attack them from the rear or sides. Vehicles that have weak armor can be destroyed by ramming attacks.
_x0034_0.description: A medium tank can perform well on any type of map and against any type of enemy vehicle. Study the features of your own vehicles to understand how to emerge victorious in any situation.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage by ramming

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0034_1.name: MT-11: Ram Them!
_x0034_1.hint: The higher the speed and the greater your vehicle's weight, the more damage you will cause by ramming an enemy vehicle.
_x0034_1.description: Some situations call for unconventional tactics.

primary.conditions: • Set an enemy vehicle on fire

secondary.conditions: • Be among the top 5 players on your team by experience earned

_x0034_2.name: MT-12: The Incinerator
_x0034_2.hint: Penetrating hits that strike the engine or fuel tanks have a chance of causing a fire. Study diagrams of vehicles to learn where these crucial modules are located.
_x0034_2.description: Setting an enemy vehicle on fire is one of the most efficient ways to destroy it.

primary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Be among the top 5 players on your team by experience earned

_x0034_3.name: MT-13: Aggressive Actions
_x0034_3.hint: As soon as you destroy an enemy, move on to the next target. Your teammates most likely need your help somewhere else.
_x0034_3.description: A Platoon of medium tanks can be of great help to the team across the entire battlefield. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0034_4.name: MT-14: Team Play
_x0034_4.hint: Select one target at a time and focus your fire to rapidly crack the toughest defense. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the spotted vehicle by selecting “Requesting fire at…” from the Command Menu.
_x0034_4.description: In a battle, you must rely on your own skill as well as on your Platoon members and allies. If all members of your team fight as one, victory is guaranteed! This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy tank destroyers

secondary.conditions: • Cause damage to 5 enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0034_5.name: MT-15: Hunt Down the Hunter
_x0034_5.hint: Think where you would position your tank destroyer if you drove one. This may be the spot where an enemy tank destroyer is hiding right now. TDs are often set up to cover the most common lanes of attack, so try hitting them from an unexpected direction.
_x0034_5.description: You can turn the tide of the battle by taking out enemy tank destroyers.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 7 players on your team by experience earned

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0034_6.name: TD-1: Effective Performance
_x0034_6.hint: Tank destroyers have serious firepower, but most are relatively fragile. Try engaging from long range—the accuracy of your gun allows for this.
_x0034_6.description: Tank destroyers are a great choice for players who like to destroy enemy vehicles from a distance.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an internal module or injure a crew member

secondary.conditions: • At the end of the battle, have no injured crew members or damaged/destroyed internal modules

_x0034_7.name: TD-2: Aimed Fire
_x0034_7.hint: A successful hit can damage or destroy the enemy vehicle's modules or injure the crew. High-Explosive shells are sometimes effective for this purpose.
_x0034_7.description: Destroying an enemy vehicle's modules and injuring its crew members can render it almost useless.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage to 2 enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0034_8.name: TD-3: Good Hunting!
_x0034_8.hint: Many tank destroyers are lightly armored, and most lack turrets. Engaging at long range is usually the safest tactic.
_x0034_8.description: The most important advantage of tank destroyers is their great firepower.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle. Remain unspotted by it at the moment of its destruction

secondary.conditions: • Enter a battle with Camouflage Net

_x0034_9.name: TD-4: Ambush
_x0034_9.hint: Try to find a concealed position for firing. A thick bush or a fallen tree will do. A high camouflage rating will help you remain unspotted; so will engaging from long range.
_x0034_9.description: Concealment is key to the survival of a tank destroyer.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage from a distance of 300 m or more

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0035_0.name: TD-5: A Long-Range Gun
_x0035_0.hint: Wait until you are fully aimed before firing. A hasty shot is often a wasted shot.
_x0035_0.description: When you drive a tank destroyer, it is important to know how to effectively shoot at long range.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage from a distance of 250 m or more

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0035_1.name: TD-6: They Shall Not Pass!
_x0035_1.hint: Make sure that your vehicle is hidden behind bushes or fallen trees before firing. If your vehicle is 15 m behind a bush or fallen tree, you have a better chance of remaining concealed after firing.
_x0035_1.description: Try to keep enemy vehicles as far from your position as possible. Destroy them while they are approaching, as it will be much harder to blunt the attack in close combat.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle, having received no prior damage to your vehicle.

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0035_2.name: TD-7: The First Strike
_x0035_2.hint: If an enemy vehicle is charging at you and you cannot penetrate its frontal armor, you may be able to destroy its track and get away. Study the parameters of your own vehicle. Some tank destroyers have strong frontal armor that can deflect considerable hits.
_x0035_2.description: Do not let the enemy get too close to you: most TDs are thinly armored.

primary.conditions: • Cause 2 times more damage than the hit points of your vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0035_3.name: TD-8: A Huge Caliber
_x0035_3.hint: Look for every chance to damage enemy vehicles, but at the same time, also try to survive.
_x0035_3.description: As a tank destroyer driver, you will be expected to cause more damage to enemies than the amount of HP of your own vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Score 3 armor-penetrating hits in a row

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0035_4.name: TD-9: Spot On!
_x0035_4.hint: Aim at the weak spots of an enemy vehicle, such as the sides, rear, and lower glacis plate. It is also helpful to know the location of key components such as ammunition racks and fuel tanks. To play most effectively, you may wish to take a few Premium shells into the battle. These shells can penetrate much thicker armor than standard ones.
_x0035_4.description: The great characteristics of your gun compensate for the relatively weak armor protection of your vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage, remain unspotted at the moment when the damage is caused

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0035_5.name: TD-10: A Hidden Menace
_x0035_5.hint: Use camouflage and Camouflage Net. Keep your distance and let your teammates do the spotting. You serve your team by staying out of sight, but be in a position to fire when the opportunity arises.
_x0035_5.description: If your tank destroyer is well-concealed, you can strike the unsuspecting enemy without them being able to respond.

primary.conditions: • Finish the battle as the top player on your team by damage caused • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0035_6.name: TD-11: The Key Role
_x0035_6.hint: A major challenge for tank destroyers is surviving the battle long enough to achieve their full damage-dealing potential. You must engage, but you must also stay alive.
_x0035_6.description: Your powerful gun is a force to be reckoned with. If, of course, you know how to shoot it.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy heavy tank • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0035_7.name: TD-12: Big Game Hunting
_x0035_7.hint: You have the potential to carry your team to victory. If you know the weak spots of enemy heavy tanks, the thickness of their armor cannot save them.
_x0035_7.description: Armed with your wits and an excellent gun, you can destroy enemy vehicles before they get close. Once an enemy heavy tank has been spotted, you can cause a lot of damage to them before they even spot you.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0035_8.name: TD-13: Tank Hunters
_x0035_8.hint: Most tank destroyers have excellent single-shot damage. Coordinate with Platoon mates and fire in volleys. Not many enemy vehicles can stand up to multiple, simultaneous hits.
_x0035_8.description: As a Platoon, you can focus your fire and rapidly take down enemy tanks. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Cause 20% of the total amount of damage caused by your team • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0035_9.name: TD-14: Big Hunt
_x0035_9.hint: Provide covering fire for members of your Platoon who have taken a beating. Sometimes it is better to draw enemy fire yourself in order to give an ally a chance to retreat to safety.
_x0035_9.description: A well-coordinated Platoon of tank destroyers will not allow the enemy to outflank their team's positions. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0036_0.name: TD-15: Triumph
_x0036_0.hint: The more damage you cause in a battle, the better the chance of victory for your team. It is a simple rule that you should remember.
_x0036_0.description: When diplomacy fails, the guns start to speak. So get your loaded word in.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles 3 times

secondary.conditions: • Cause damage 3 times to enemy vehicles

_x0036_1.name: SPG-1: A Bold Claim
_x0036_1.description: The large burst radius after a shell explosion is the key feature of SPG vehicles. Even if you failed to deliver a direct hit to the target enemy vehicle, there is still a chance to cause serious trouble by stunning it. The enemy vehicle is marked with the stun indicator, which is visible to your allies. If allies cause damage to the vehicles stunned by you, you will receive additional credits and experience for damage caused with your assistance.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 50 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted.

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0036_2.name: SPG-2: Time Is Money
_x0036_2.description: An enemy vehicle remains stunned for a particular period of time and cannot do their best on the battlefield. Remember: a stunned vehicle becomes an easy target.

primary.conditions: • Stun a heavy tank or tank destroyer 2 times

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0036_3.name: SPG-3: Slow and Steady Gets Stunned
_x0036_3.description: Concealed and powerful enemy tank destroyers and well-armored heavy tanks can easily turn the tide of the battle. They are the first-priority targets, and causing damage to them (or assisting in their destruction) should be the primary objective for a player in an SPG. The majority of heavies and tank destroyers are slow and hulking, which increases the chances for a successful shot.

primary.conditions: • Stun an enemy heavy tank or tank destroyer for 30 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted.

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0036_4.name: SPG-4: I'll See You Through
_x0036_4.description: Learn the major routes of the enemy heavy tanks and positions where the cunning tank destroyers usually hide. Aiming at a particular map area in advance increases the chances for effective and devastating fire at enemy positions. These types of vehicles usually follow rather predictable tactics on certain maps. Be smart: analyze the setup of the enemy team and select the most suitable position from the very start of the battle.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 600 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by stunning or immobilizing them

secondary.conditions: • Cause damage 3 times to enemy vehicles

_x0036_5.name: SPG-5: Sharing is Caring
_x0036_5.description: Stunning enemy vehicles not only brings your team one step closer to victory, but also ensures you receive additional experience and credits if your allies cause damage to enemy vehicles stunned by you. Do not forget to mark the area you are aiming at (the T key by default) to notify and draw the attention of your allies.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause damage to 2 different vehicles by stunning or immobilizing them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0036_6.name: SPG-6: Hammer of the Gods
_x0036_6.description: The primary objective of SPGs is to provide fire support to allied vehicles. Stunned enemy vehicles are poor fighters, so your teammates will certainly appreciate your assistance. However, be cautious when firing: a careless shot can also stun an allied vehicle. Friendly fire will not be tolerated!

primary.conditions: • Stun 2 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0036_7.name: SPG-7: Careful Consideration
_x0036_7.description: To complete this mission, use a selective approach to choosing your targets. Do not concentrate fire on one enemy vehicle, even if it is an easy target. The best strategy is to hit big groups of enemy vehicles with one shot. Study the maps and learn the basic routes of vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 7 players on your team by experience earned

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0036_8.name: SPG-8: I Did My Best
_x0036_8.description: You receive experience for all effective actions. Try to be the MVP: cause damage, assist in destroying enemy vehicles, and survive the battle. Change your position after every shot; otherwise, the counter fire of enemy SPGs can destroy your vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Damage or destroy modules or injure crew members, totaling at least 3 modules or crew members

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0036_9.name: SPG-9: Collateral Damage
_x0036_9.description: Powerful HE shells can not only reduce the hit points of enemy vehicles, but also have a high chance of destroying modules or injuring crew members with splash damage.

primary.conditions: • Cause, or assist in causing 1,000 HP of damage by stunning or immobilizing.

secondary.conditions: • Allies must destroy an enemy vehicle stunned or immobilized by you

_x0037_0.name: SPG-10: All Included
_x0037_0.description: The battle situation can change rapidly—always keep an eye on the minimap and make sure you have a clear view of enemy vehicles. You will have to move across the map all the time instead of staying in one position. Your allies rely on your SPG firepower, so do your best in the right place at the right time.

primary.conditions: • Stun 2 enemy vehicles with a single shot

secondary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 50 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted.

_x0037_1.name: SPG-11: The Area of Effect
_x0037_1.description: In addition to the considerable amount of damage caused by a well-placed shot, a High-Explosive shell can also stun all misplaced vehicles within the burst radius after the shell explosion. Many maps feature spots where enemy vehicles bunch together. Take your chance and send your highly "explosive" regards to them.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 50 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted. • Allies must destroy an enemy vehicle stunned or immobilized by you

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0037_2.name: SPG-12: The Evil Eye
_x0037_2.description: Your allies destroyed the stunned enemy vehicle? Good news for you, since it is your contribution that brings the desired victory one step closer! Your objective is to provide fire support and assist your allies in the right place at the right time.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 4 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them or • Stun enemy vehicles 6 times

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0037_3.name: SPG-13: C for Cooperation
_x0037_3.description: Strong cooperation between SPGs and allies should make the enemy team extremely worried. Coordinate your actions and focus your fire on one enemy target at a time.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 70 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted. or • Allies must cause 400 HP of damage to the immobilized enemy vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0037_4.name: SPG-14: One of Us!
_x0037_4.description: Cooperation is the key to victory for the whole team. Highlight the enemy vehicle you are aiming at for your allies to immediately bring down fire on it once it has been stunned or immobilized. Remember: a lone soldier can hardly make a battle.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 5 players on your team by experience earned • Enable your allies to cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by stunning or immobilizing them

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0037_5.name: SPG-15: War Gods
_x0037_5.description: An SPG that survives for as long as possible is a real asset for the team. Keep firing one shell after another while trying not to get caught under enemy fire. Take your time and think twice before "pulling the trigger", since "one shot—one hit" is the best strategy for a vehicle with a long reload time.

_x0031_.description: A set of missions for all vehicle types to receive the German StuG IV tank destroyer.

_x0032_.name: T28 Heavy Tank Concept

primary.conditions: • Cause 3 times more damage than the hit points of your vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_28.name: TD-8: A Huge Caliber
_x0031_28.hint: Look for every chance to damage enemy vehicles, but at the same time, also try to survive.
_x0031_28.description: As a tank destroyer driver, you will be expected to cause more damage to enemies than the amount of HP of your own vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Score 4 armor-penetrating hits in a row

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0031_29.name: TD-9: Spot On!
_x0031_29.hint: Aim at the weak spots of an enemy vehicle, such as the sides, rear, and lower glacis plate. It is also helpful to know the location of key components such as ammunition racks and fuel tanks. To play most effectively, you may wish to take a few Premium shells into the battle. These shells can penetrate much thicker armor than standard ones.
_x0031_29.description: The great characteristics of your gun compensate for the relatively weak armor protection of your vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage, remaining unspotted at the moment when the damage is caused

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_30.name: TD-10: A Hidden Menace
_x0031_30.hint: Use camouflage and Camouflage Net. Keep your distance and let your teammates do the spotting. You serve your team by staying out of sight, but be in a position to fire when the opportunity arises.
_x0031_30.description: If your tank destroyer is well-concealed, you can strike the unsuspecting enemy without them being able to respond.

primary.conditions: • Finish the battle as the top player on your team by damage caused • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_31.name: TD-11: The Key Role
_x0031_31.hint: A major challenge for tank destroyers is surviving the battle long enough to achieve their full damage-dealing potential. You must engage, but you must also stay alive.
_x0031_31.description: Your powerful gun is a force to be reckoned with. If, of course, you know how to shoot it.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy heavy tank of Tier I or higher • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_32.name: TD-12: Big Game Hunting
_x0031_32.hint: You have the potential to carry your team to victory. If you know the weak spots of enemy heavy tanks, the thickness of their armor cannot save them.
_x0031_32.description: Armed with your wits and an excellent gun, you can destroy enemy vehicles before they get close. Once an enemy heavy tank has been spotted, you can cause a lot of damage to them before they even spot you.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 4 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_33.name: TD-13: Tank Hunters
_x0031_33.hint: Most tank destroyers have excellent single-shot damage. Coordinate with Platoon mates and fire in volleys. Not many enemy vehicles can stand up to multiple, simultaneous hits.
_x0031_33.description: As a Platoon, you can focus your fire and rapidly take down enemy tanks. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Cause 25% of the total amount of damage caused by your team • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_34.name: TD-14: Big Hunt
_x0031_34.hint: Provide covering fire for members of your Platoon who have taken a beating. Sometimes it is better to draw enemy fire yourself in order to give an ally a chance to retreat to safety.
_x0031_34.description: A well-coordinated Platoon of tank destroyers will not allow the enemy to outflank their team's positions. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Cause 3,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_35.name: TD-15: Triumph
_x0031_35.hint: The more damage you cause in a battle, the better the chance of victory for your team. It is a simple rule that you should remember.
_x0031_35.description: When diplomacy fails, the guns start to speak. So get your loaded word in.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles 5 times

secondary.conditions: • Cause damage 5 times to enemy vehicles

_x0031_36.name: SPG-1: A Bold Claim
_x0031_36.description: The large burst radius after a shell explosion is the key feature of SPG vehicles. Even if you failed to deliver a direct hit to the target enemy vehicle, there is still a chance to cause serious trouble by stunning it. The enemy vehicle is marked with the stun indicator, which is visible to your allies. If allies cause damage to the vehicles stunned by you, you will receive additional credits and experience for damage caused with your assistance.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 100 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted.

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0031_37.name: SPG-2: Time Is Money
_x0031_37.description: An enemy vehicle remains stunned for a particular period of time and cannot do their best on the battlefield. Remember: a stunned vehicle becomes an easy target.

primary.conditions: • Stun heavy tanks or tank destroyers 4 times

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_38.name: SPG-3: Slow and Steady Gets Stunned
_x0031_38.description: Concealed and powerful enemy tank destroyers and well-armored heavy tanks can easily turn the tide of the battle. They are the first-priority targets, and causing damage to them (or assisting in their destruction) should be the primary objective for a player in an SPG. The majority of heavies and tank destroyers are slow and hulking, which increases the chances for a successful shot.

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_39.description: Learn the major routes of the enemy heavy tanks and positions where the cunning tank destroyers usually hide. Aiming at a particular map area in advance increases the chances for effective and devastating fire at enemy positions. These types of vehicles usually follow rather predictable tactics on certain maps. Be smart: analyze the setup of the enemy team and select the most suitable position from the very start of the battle.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by stunning or immobilizing them

secondary.conditions: • Cause damage 5 times to enemy vehicles

_x0031_40.name: SPG-5: Sharing is Caring
_x0031_40.description: Stunning enemy vehicles not only brings your team one step closer to victory, but also ensures you receive additional experience and credits if your allies cause damage to enemy vehicles stunned by you. Do not forget to mark the area you are aiming at (the T key by default) to notify and draw the attention of your allies.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause damage to 3 different vehicles by stunning or immobilizing them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_41.name: SPG-6: Hammer of the Gods
_x0031_41.description: The primary objective of SPGs is to provide fire support to allied vehicles. Stunned enemy vehicles are poor fighters, so your teammates will certainly appreciate your assistance. However, be cautious when firing: a careless shot can also stun an allied vehicle. Friendly fire will not be tolerated!

primary.conditions: • Stun 3 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_42.name: SPG-7: Careful Consideration
_x0031_42.description: To complete this mission, use a selective approach to choosing your targets. Do not concentrate fire on one enemy vehicle, even if it is an easy target. The best strategy is to hit big groups of enemy vehicles with one shot. Study the maps and learn the basic routes of vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 5 players on your team by experience earned

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_43.name: SPG-8: I Did My Best
_x0031_43.description: You receive experience for all effective actions. Try to be the MVP: cause damage, assist in destroying enemy vehicles, and survive the battle. Change your position after every shot; otherwise, the counter fire of enemy SPGs can destroy your vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Damage or destroy modules or injure crew members, totaling at least 5 modules or crew members

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_44.name: SPG-9: Collateral Damage
_x0031_44.description: Powerful HE shells can not only reduce the hit points of enemy vehicles, but also have a high chance of destroying modules or injuring crew members with splash damage.

primary.conditions: • Cause, or assist in causing 2,000 HP of damage by stunning or immobilizing

secondary.conditions: • Allies must destroy an enemy vehicle stunned or immobilized by you

_x0031_45.name: SPG-10: All Included
_x0031_45.description: The battle situation can change rapidly—always keep an eye on the minimap and make sure you have a clear view of enemy vehicles. You will have to move across the map all the time instead of staying in one position. Your allies rely on your SPG firepower, so do your best in the right place at the right time.

primary.conditions: • Stun 2 enemy vehicles with a single shot twice

secondary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 100 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted.

_x0031_46.name: SPG-11: The Area of Effect
_x0031_46.description: In addition to the considerable amount of damage caused by a well-placed shot, a High-Explosive shell can also stun all misplaced vehicles within the burst radius after the shell explosion. Many maps feature spots where enemy vehicles bunch together. Take your chance and send your highly "explosive" regards to them.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 100 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted. • Allies must destroy an enemy vehicle stunned or immobilized by you

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_47.name: SPG-12: The Evil Eye
_x0031_47.description: Your allies destroyed the stunned enemy vehicle? Good news for you, since it is your contribution that brings the desired victory one step closer! Your objective is to provide fire support and assist your allies in the right place at the right time.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 6 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them or • Stun enemy vehicles 8 times

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_48.name: SPG-13: C for Cooperation
_x0031_48.description: Strong cooperation between SPGs and allies should make the enemy team extremely worried. Coordinate your actions and focus your fire on one enemy target at a time.

primary.conditions: • Stun enemy vehicles for 100 seconds in total. Potential stun duration is counted. or • Allies must cause 600 HP of damage to the enemy vehicle immobilized by you

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_49.name: SPG-14: One of Us!
_x0031_49.description: Cooperation is the key to victory for the whole team. Highlight the enemy vehicle you are aiming at for your allies to immediately bring down fire on it once it has been stunned or immobilized. Remember: a lone soldier can hardly make a battle.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 3 players on your team by experience earned • Enable your allies to cause 1,500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by stunning or immobilizing them

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_50.name: SPG-15: War Gods
_x0031_50.description: An SPG that survives for as long as possible is a real asset for the team. Keep firing one shell after another while trying not to get caught under enemy fire. Take your time and think twice before "pulling the trigger", since "one shot—one hit" is the best strategy for a vehicle with a long reload time.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 5 players on your team by experience earned • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0037_6.name: LT-1: For Victory!
_x0037_6.hint: Still, try to avoid face-to-face combat. Instead, try to hit enemies in the side or rear. Observe where the enemy vehicle's gun is pointing and approach from the other side.
_x0037_6.description: At lower tiers, some light tanks have almost as much firepower as heavier vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Spot 4 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0037_7.name: LT-2: Reconnaissance
_x0037_7.hint: But to spot a few enemy vehicles and get destroyed in the process would be a waste of your valuable tank. A good scout can spot enemies while successfully staying alive.
_x0037_7.description: One of the main objectives of light tanks is to spot enemy vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 3 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0037_8.name: LT-3: The Pursuit
_x0037_8.hint: Always try to flank the enemy and hit them from the rear, where the armor is weakest. Do not linger in one spot. If you change positions frequently, the enemy will have a hard time hitting your vehicle. Remember that light tanks have the same chance of being detected while on the move as when they are stationary.
_x0037_8.description: Your light tank has enough speed to quickly cross the map and provide support to your allies where your help is needed.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 1 track • Destroy a track of an enemy vehicle. Your allies must cause 250 of damage to that vehicle while it is immobilized

secondary.conditions: • Destroy a track of an enemy vehicle. Your allies must destroy that vehicle while it is immobilized

_x0037_9.name: LT-4: A Forced Halt
_x0037_9.hint: To destroy a track effectively, target the drive wheel at the front or rear of the suspension. Remember that even if your gun is incapable of penetrating the armor of an enemy vehicle, it can always destroy the track. HE shells are best suited for this purpose. You will receive more experience if your allies cause damage to enemy vehicles immobilized by you.
_x0037_9.description: Destroy a track of an enemy vehicle, thus immobilizing it and exposing it to the fire of your teammates’ more powerful guns. When you destroy a track of an enemy vehicle you temporarily immobilize it. This will help you and your allies to take better aim.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to destroy 2 vehicles spotted by you

secondary.conditions: • Spot enemy vehicles and enable your allies to cause damage to 4 vehicles spotted by you

_x0038_0.name: LT-5: The Forward Observer
_x0038_0.hint: Once you have spotted an enemy, keep it under observation long enough for your teammates to take aim and fire. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the spotted vehicle by selecting "Requesting fire at…" from the Command Menu.
_x0038_0.description: At the higher tiers, light tanks are very vulnerable to enemy fire. Do what light tanks are made to do: spot enemy vehicles.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause damage to 4 vehicles by spotting them or destroying their tracks

secondary.conditions: • Enable your allies to destroy at least 1 enemy vehicle by spotting it or destroying its tracks

_x0038_1.name: LT-6: Battle Support
_x0038_1.hint: The longer your view range, the better. Try to spot enemy vehicles and hit their tracks while keeping yourself alive. Equipment such as Coated Optics and Binocular Telescope can help you to spot the enemy from a safe distance.
_x0038_1.description: Damage caused with your assistance is one of the most important statistics for light tanks. If this statistic is high, that means you were an asset to your team in battle.

primary.conditions: • Spot and cause damage to 1 enemy SPG

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0038_2.name: LT-7: The SPG Hunter
_x0038_2.hint: Taking out enemy artillery is not easy. Wait until your teammates have gotten the enemy's attention, and then rush to the enemy SPGs. When you engage them, try not to cross in front of their guns. Instead, hit them from the sides and rear.
_x0038_2.description: Artillery is a priority target for light tanks. Destroying enemy SPGs will greatly increase your team's chance of victory.

primary.conditions: • Participate in a successful capture of a base or reset the enemy capture points of your/neutral base, earning 20 base points • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0038_3.name: LT-8: Get Out of Our Base!
_x0038_3.hint: If you are not 100% positive that your shells will penetrate the invader’s armor, load a High-Explosive shell instead. HE shells have a greater probability of causing damage to the enemy vehicle. Remember, all it takes is 1 HP of damage to the enemy vehicle or a damaged module to reset the capture points of your base. When you are attempting to capture a base, try to avoid enemy fire as much as possible.
_x0038_3.description: In the heat of battle, it is easy to forget about the defense of your own or the neutral base. Such imprudence may allow the enemy to gain the upper hand and seize the objective rapidly. Remember, your tank has enough speed to break contact and retreat to defend the base and fend off the invaders with precise shots or a daring ramming attack, thus saving your team from an imminent defeat.

primary.conditions: • Spot 2 vehicles while remaining unspotted

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0038_4.name: LT-9: Hawk-Eyed
_x0038_4.hint: Upgrading your turret may improve your view range. This will help you to spot enemy vehicles long before they get close.
_x0038_4.description: Light tanks are the eyes of their team. They help to spot enemy vehicles and keep them visible during the battle.

primary.conditions: • Finish the battle as the top player on your team by experience earned

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0038_5.name: LT-10: The Best Result
_x0038_5.hint: A good scout knows when to be cautious and when to be aggressive. Stay alert to the flow of battle.
_x0038_5.description: The more effective you are in a battle, the more experience you will earn. Show them what a light tank is capable of!

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 6 times to enemy vehicles that are of the same tier as your vehicle or higher by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Cause 1,500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by shooting them

_x0038_6.name: LT-11: A Fair Fight
_x0038_6.hint: High-tier light tanks can carry significant firepower. On the one hand, your gun may be inferior to the gun on a heavy tank, but, on the other hand, your gun will probably penetrate a heavy tank's rear armor quite nicely.
_x0038_6.description: The higher the tier of your light tank, the more firepower you get, in addition to your speed, view range, and stealth.

primary.conditions: • Spot enemy vehicles and enable your allies to cause 750 HP of damage to vehicles spotted by you. Remain unspotted at the moment when the damage is caused

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0038_7.name: LT-12: The Ghost
_x0038_7.hint: Once the enemy spots you, you will have to stay constantly on the move. But if you have not yet been spotted, find a position in a bush where you can stay concealed while lighting up the enemy. Equip your tank for stealth beforehand.
_x0038_7.description: Good concealment increases your chances of survival in battle. Light tanks have great concealment abilities, thanks to their relatively low silhouettes.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 2,000 HP of damage • Cause 1,500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0038_8.name: LT-13: The Key to Victory
_x0038_8.hint: If you join a battle as part of a Platoon, make sure that you have solid voice communication among your Platoon members. This will help to save the time you usually spend typing messages in Chat.
_x0038_8.description: Victory is easier to achieve when you are part of a Platoon, and even more so when your tactical unit is well coordinated. While you are distracting the enemy and relaying their position, your Platoon members will cause damage to targets spotted by you, bringing your team one step closer to victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 2,500 HP of damage

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0038_9.name: LT-14: The Battle Watch
_x0038_9.hint: The more experienced players fighting alongside you in battle, the higher the combat efficiency of your team. Greatly increase the team's effectiveness by entering a battle in a Platoon. Alternatively, you can play alone if your are confident that you have high enough skill and that your allies will not let you down.
_x0038_9.description: A light tank in a coordinated Platoon can spell disaster for the enemy team. Platoon with vehicles that complement your playstyle: you might want to go into battle platooned with SPGs, or you may prefer a fast-moving pack of light tanks. Do not be afraid to experiment with different lineups. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Damage caused and damage caused with your assistance must total 4,000 HP

secondary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause damage to 5 vehicles by spotting them or destroying their tracks • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0039_0.name: LT-15: The Aggressive Recon Specialist
_x0039_0.hint: You are not a bull in a china shop. There is no need to break through right away. Be patient, choose your moment, and appear where the enemy is not expecting you. Your advantages are your speed, maneuverability, and view range—use them wisely. Do not forget that your vehicle also has a gun.
_x0039_0.description: It's time to show the enemy what a real light tank can do!

primary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0039_1.name: HT-1: Debut
_x0039_1.hint: You will encounter other heavy tanks with very thick armor. Learn to aim at their thinner plates and at weak spots.
_x0039_1.description: The guns of heavy tanks are powerful, but still benefit from skillful aim.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 2 vehicles from a distance of 100 m or less

secondary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0039_2.name: HT-2: Point Blank Shooting
_x0039_2.hint: The effectiveness of the Sniper mode significantly decreases when the enemy vehicle is getting closer. Sometimes it is better to switch to Arcade aim by pressing Shift or using the mouse wheel.
_x0039_2.description: Even in the most heated battle, your tank can destroy the enemy and survive.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles of 2 different types

secondary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0039_3.name: HT-3: Omnivorous
_x0039_3.hint: Every type of vehicle employs its own unique tactics on the battlefield. For example, medium tanks can easily outflank opponents, heavy tanks will most likely meet enemies head-on, and tank destroyers will prefer to position themselves on hills or hide behind bushes.
_x0039_3.description: Prove that your tank can destroy an enemy vehicle of any type.

primary.conditions: • Destroy internal modules or injure crew members, totaling at least 3 modules or crew members

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle

_x0039_4.name: HT-4: Hit Them Where It Hurts!
_x0039_4.hint: You can immobilize an enemy vehicle by hitting its engine, while just one precise hit to the ammo rack of a vehicle can give you the upper hand in the most difficult duel. Internal modules are the turret ring, engine, fuel tanks, ammo rack, and radio.
_x0039_4.description: You must know not only your own tank, but your opponents' vehicles as well. Carefully study the vehicles that you are likely to encounter in battle and hit their weak spots.

primary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to vehicles within the view range of your vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles

_x0039_5.name: HT-5: Target Acquired!
_x0039_5.hint: Constantly evaluate the situation on the battlefield. Often it is better to retreat from a disadvantageous situation, so you can cause more damage later.
_x0039_5.description: Leave your enemy no chances by hitting them at the first opportunity. Every successful hit brings your team one step closer to victory.

primary.conditions: • Destroy a total of 2 heavy or medium tanks of the same tier as your vehicle or higher

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0039_6.name: HT-6: A Two-Course Meal
_x0039_6.hint: As for medium tanks, you should be wary of their speed and maneuverability, as they usually avoid direct combat. Always monitor the minimap to quickly react to a medium tank's unexpected arrival.
_x0039_6.description: Most heavy tanks have extremely thick armor on the front. If you cannot flank them, try hitting the spots where the frontal armor is the thinnest. Weak spots usually include hatches, observation devices, the commander's cupola, and the lower glacis plate.

primary.conditions: • Participate in a successful capture of a base or reset the enemy capture points of your/neutral base • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0039_7.name: HT-7: I've Got It Covered
_x0039_7.hint: Be careful when approaching the enemy base—get ready for a "warm" reception. If you prefer defensive tactics, make use of the terrain to find the best concealment and vantage points, which you can use to defend your own base (or the neutral base in an Encounter Battle) against the approaching enemy.
_x0039_7.description: Heavy tanks are great for breakthrough tactics. Punch through the enemy defensive lines and capture their base. However, do not underestimate your enemy—they might employ the same strategy.

primary.conditions: • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy heavy tanks

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles

_x0039_8.name: HT-8: With Guns Blazing
_x0039_8.hint: As a heavy tank, you are the backbone of your team. Enemy heavy tanks are just as important. Take them on and try to destroy them first, or at least keep them busy for as long as possible.
_x0039_8.description: Remember, your armor is your key strength. Cause as much damage as possible while your opponents enjoy the non-penetration messages over and over again.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle by ramming. Survive the ramming attack on the enemy

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0039_9.name: HT-9: A Crushing Blow
_x0039_9.hint: The driver's Controlled Impact skill and the Spall Liner equipment can significantly reduce the damage done to your vehicle by ramming, and, at the same time, increase the damage of your own ramming attacks.
_x0039_9.description: Close-quarters engagements often render you unable to reload in time. In this situation, finish an enemy off by ramming them! The weaker the enemy vehicle's armor at the point of impact, the more damage you will cause.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 3 players on both teams by damage caused

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_00.name: HT-10: A Weighty Argument
_x0031_00.hint: The heat of battle is exactly the time when your tank can show all it is worth. Your great armor protection, if used efficiently, will ensure survival even in an almost hopeless situation. The longer your tank survives in a battle, the more damage you can cause to the enemy.
_x0031_00.description: Keep your gun active and keep yourself alive as long as possible.

primary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • At the end of the battle, have no injured crew members or damaged/destroyed internal modules

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 3 enemy vehicles

_x0031_01.name: HT-11: Not Even a Scratch!
_x0031_01.hint: Use a First Aid Kit or a Repair Kit if the enemy destroys a key module of your vehicle or injures a crew member.
_x0031_01.description: Every module destroyed and crew member injured can become a problem. Try to keep them as safe as possible when breaking through the enemy ranks.

primary.conditions: • Have total damage blocked by armor equal to or exceeding 2 times the hit points of your vehicle • Cause 1,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_02.name: HT-12: Sturdy Armor
_x0031_02.hint: As much as possible, present your front armor to the enemy and hide your flanks and weak spots. Angle your armor to increase its effectiveness.
_x0031_02.description: Your armor can block a great amount of damage if you use it well.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 2 vehicles during the first 3 minutes of the battle

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_03.name: HT-13: Storm the Defense!
_x0031_03.hint: When playing as part of a Platoon, protect each other’s flanks and focus your fire on the enemy. Keep each other alive, tear into the enemy, and find a way to win the battle.
_x0031_03.description: A Platoon of well-coordinated heavy tanks can turn the tide of the most desperate battle. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 4 enemy vehicles of 2 different types

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_04.name: HT-14: Take that Hill!
_x0031_04.hint: Coordinate with your teammates and cover as much of the battlefield as possible with destructive fire.
_x0031_04.description: Destroy all types of enemy vehicles, stop them cold, and leave them with no hope of victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Cause, receive, and block a total of 6,000 HP of damage

secondary.conditions: • Cause 20% of the total amount of damage caused by your team • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_05.name: HT-15: Tempered Steel
_x0031_05.hint: Act carefully. Survive! Try to protect your side and rear armor from enemy fire. Heavy tanks can carry almost every battle, that is why they are always high-value targets for enemy SPGs. Keep a cool head and do not let them pin you down.
_x0031_05.description: A heavy tank can hit hard, but it can also take a hit and keep battling. Engage the enemy and keep the pressure on.

primary.conditions: • Be among the top 5 players on your team by experience earned • Cause damage to an enemy vehicle • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_06.name: MT-1: First Steps
_x0031_06.hint: Hit the enemy at any opportunity, but try to avoid their fire as well.
_x0031_06.description: At lower tiers, most medium tanks can take on any other type of vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 9 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0031_07.name: MT-2: Good Hit!
_x0031_07.hint: The penetration chance marker on your reticle shows the chance of penetrating the enemy vehicle at a particular point. A red marker indicates no chance of penetration, a yellow marker indicates a low chance of penetration, a green marker indicates a high chance of penetration. Try to aim at the sides or the rear of enemy vehicles. Look for their weak spots.
_x0031_07.description: Every successful shot brings your team one step closer to victory. However, it is not always easy to land a solid hit on an enemy vehicle.

primary.conditions: • Cause 750 HP of damage during the first 2 minutes of the battle

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_08.name: MT-3: The Spearhead
_x0031_08.hint: Move aggressively to get behind the enemy lines and make a commotion there, putting the opposing team at a disadvantage.
_x0031_08.description: Medium tanks are maneuverable vehicles with impressive guns.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 2 tracks by shooting • Cause damage to an immobilized enemy vehicle 2 times

secondary.conditions: • Destroy an immobilized enemy vehicle

_x0031_09.name: MT-4: Stay Still, Would You?
_x0031_09.hint: Aim for the drive wheels, the sprocketed wheels at the front or rear of the suspension. Once immobilized, an enemy tank is an easy target. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the target vehicle by selecting "Requesting fire at…" from the Command Menu.
_x0031_09.description: Destroying an enemy's track can leave them vulnerable to more shots from you or your allies.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy light tank

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_10.name: MT-5: Counter-Reconnaissance
_x0031_10.hint: Do not let enemy light tanks achieve their main objective! Prevent them from spotting and immobilizing the vehicles of your teammates.
_x0031_10.description: One of the objectives of medium tanks is to destroy light tanks.

primary.conditions: • Cause 2,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles of 3 different types

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0031_11.name: MT-6: Rapid Fire
_x0031_11.hint: Your tank combines mobility and firepower: use them both. You can help your teammates on one flank, then retreat to the base to protect the SPGs, and then suddenly strike the enemy from the rear—all in one battle.
_x0031_11.description: Medium tanks are flexible and able to achieve a variety of objectives on the battlefield.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 1 enemy SPG

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_12.name: MT-7: A Surprise Blow
_x0031_12.hint: Enemy artillery can cause heavy damage to your teammates. Break through a flank, rush to the enemy base, and neutralize their SPGs.
_x0031_12.description: Enemy SPGs are high-priority targets for you. Neutralize them to get your team one step closer to victory.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 5 times to enemy medium tanks by shooting them • Cause 750 HP of damage to enemy medium tanks

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_13.name: MT-8: Confrontation
_x0031_13.hint: Focus on the vehicles of your tier or higher. A fight against strong opponents will help you sharpen your skill with medium tanks, as well as receive more valuable rewards after battles.
_x0031_13.description: Destroy same-tier enemy vehicles or vehicles of a higher tier to significantly contribute to the victory of your team.

primary.conditions: • Cause 750 HP of damage to enemy heavy tanks • Destroy an enemy heavy tank

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0031_14.name: MT-9: A Worthy Opponent
_x0031_14.hint: Outflank enemy vehicles, shoot them while concealed, target their weak spots to pick them apart—whatever it takes. Remember that heavy tanks are slower than you, and their turrets have low traverse speeds.
_x0031_14.description: Seeking and destroying enemy heavy tanks is a hard task to accomplish but very beneficial to the team's cause.

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 4 times to enemy vehicles by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0031_15.name: MT-10: A Versatile Warrior
_x0031_15.hint: Your vehicle is maneuverable. Try exploiting this advantage to outflank enemy vehicles and attack them from the rear or sides. Vehicles that have weak armor can be destroyed by ramming attacks.
_x0031_15.description: A medium tank can perform well on any type of map and against any type of enemy vehicle. Study the features of your own vehicles to understand how to emerge victorious in any situation.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle by ramming it

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0031_16.name: MT-11: Ram Them!
_x0031_16.hint: The higher the speed and the greater your vehicle's weight, the more damage you will cause by ramming an enemy vehicle.
