primary.conditions: • Participate in a successful capture of a base or reset the enemy capture points of your/neutral base, earning 60 base points • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 2 enemy vehicles

_x0032_33.name: LT-8: Get Out of Our Base!
_x0032_33.hint: If you are not 100% positive that your shells will penetrate the invader’s armor, load a High-Explosive shell instead. HE shells have a greater probability of causing damage to the enemy vehicle. Remember, all it takes is 1 HP of damage to the enemy vehicle or a damaged module to reset the capture points of your base. When you are attempting to capture a base, try to avoid enemy fire as much as possible.
_x0032_33.description: In the heat of battle, it is easy to forget about the defense of your own or the neutral base. Such imprudence may allow the enemy to gain the upper hand and seize the objective rapidly. Remember, your tank has enough speed to break contact and retreat to defend the base and fend off the invaders with precise shots or a daring ramming attack, thus saving your team from an imminent defeat.

primary.conditions: • Spot 6 vehicles while remaining unspotted

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0032_34.name: LT-9: Hawk-Eyed
_x0032_34.hint: Upgrading your turret may improve your view range. This will help you to spot enemy vehicles long before they get close.
_x0032_34.description: Light tanks are the eyes of their team. They help to spot enemy vehicles and keep them visible during the battle.

primary.conditions: • Finish the battle as the top player on both teams by experience earned • Survive the battle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0032_35.name: LT-10: The Best Result
_x0032_35.hint: A good scout knows when to be cautious and when to be aggressive. Stay alert to the flow of battle.
_x0032_35.description: The more effective you are in a battle, the more experience you will earn. Show them what a light tank is capable of!

primary.conditions: • Cause damage 12 times to enemy vehicles of the same tier as your vehicle or higher by shooting them

secondary.conditions: • Cause 2,500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by shooting them

_x0032_36.name: LT-11: A Fair Fight
_x0032_36.hint: High-tier light tanks can carry significant firepower. On the one hand, your gun may be inferior to the gun on a heavy tank, but, on the other hand, your gun will probably penetrate a heavy tank's rear armor quite nicely.
_x0032_36.description: The higher the tier of your light tank, the more firepower you get, in addition to your speed, view range, and stealth.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 3,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles by spotting them. Remain unspotted at the moment when the damage is caused

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0032_37.name: LT-12: The Ghost
_x0032_37.hint: Once the enemy spots you, you will have to stay constantly on the move. But if you have not yet been spotted, find a position in a bush where you can stay concealed while lighting up the enemy. Equip your tank for stealth beforehand.
_x0032_37.description: Good concealment increases your chances of survival in battle. Light tanks have great concealment abilities, thanks to their relatively low silhouettes.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 3,000 HP of damage • Cause 2,500 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0032_38.name: LT-13: The Key to Victory
_x0032_38.hint: If you join a battle as part of a Platoon, make sure that you have solid voice communication among your Platoon members. This will help to save the time you usually spend typing messages in Chat.
_x0032_38.description: Victory is easier to achieve when you are part of a Platoon, and even more so when your tactical unit is well coordinated. While you are distracting the enemy and relaying their position, your Platoon members will cause damage to targets spotted by you, bringing your team one step closer to victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Enable your allies to cause 6,000 HP of damage

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_39.name: LT-14: The Battle Watch
_x0032_39.hint: The more experienced players fighting alongside you in battle, the higher the combat efficiency of your team. Greatly increase the team's effectiveness by entering a battle in a Platoon. Alternatively, you can play alone if your are confident that you have high enough skill and that your allies will not let you down.
_x0032_39.description: A light tank in a coordinated Platoon can spell disaster for the enemy team. Platoon with vehicles that complement your playstyle: you might want to go into battle platooned with SPGs, or you may prefer a fast-moving pack of light tanks. Do not be afraid to experiment with different lineups. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Damage caused and damage caused with your assistance must total 8,000 HP

secondary.conditions: • Enable your allies to destroy 5 vehicles by spotting them or destroying their tracks • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0032_40.name: LT-15: The Aggressive Recon Specialist
_x0032_40.hint: You are not a bull in a china shop. There is no need to break through right away. Be patient, choose your moment, and appear where the enemy is not expecting you. Your advantages are your speed, maneuverability, and view range—use them wisely. Do not forget that your vehicle also has a gun.
_x0032_40.description: It's time to show the enemy what a real light tank can do!

primary.conditions: • Destroy 5 enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Cause 4,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0032_41.name: HT-1: Debut
_x0032_41.hint: You will encounter other heavy tanks with very thick armor. Learn to aim at their thinner plates and at weak spots.
_x0032_41.description: The guns of heavy tanks are powerful, but still benefit from skillful aim.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 4 vehicles from a distance of 100 m or less

secondary.conditions: • Cause 4,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0032_42.name: HT-2: Point Blank Shooting
_x0032_42.hint: The effectiveness of the Sniper mode significantly decreases when the enemy vehicle is getting closer. Sometimes it is better to switch to Arcade aim by pressing Shift or using the mouse wheel.
_x0032_42.description: Even in the most heated battle, your tank can destroy the enemy and survive.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 6 vehicles of 3 different types

secondary.conditions: • Cause 4,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0032_43.name: HT-3: Omnivorous
_x0032_43.hint: Every type of vehicle employs its own unique tactics on the battlefield. For example, medium tanks can easily outflank opponents, heavy tanks will most likely meet enemies head-on, and tank destroyers will prefer to position themselves on hills or hide behind bushes.
_x0032_43.description: Prove that your tank can destroy an enemy vehicle of any type.

primary.conditions: • Destroy internal modules or injure crew members, totaling at least 6 modules or crew members

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 5 enemy vehicles

_x0032_44.name: HT-4: Hit Them Where It Hurts!
_x0032_44.hint: You can immobilize an enemy vehicle by hitting its engine, while just one precise hit to the ammo rack of a vehicle can give you the upper hand in the most difficult duel. Internal modules are the turret ring, engine, fuel tanks, ammo rack, and radio.
_x0032_44.description: You must know not only your own tank, but your opponents' vehicles as well. Carefully study the vehicles that you are likely to encounter in battle and hit their weak spots.

primary.conditions: • Cause 4,000 HP of damage to vehicles within the view range of your vehicle

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 5 enemy vehicles

_x0032_45.name: HT-5: Target Acquired!
_x0032_45.hint: Constantly evaluate the situation on the battlefield. Often it is better to retreat from a disadvantageous situation, so you can cause more damage later.
_x0032_45.description: Leave your enemy no chances by hitting them at the first opportunity. Every successful hit brings your team one step closer to victory.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 4 enemy heavy or medium tanks

secondary.conditions: • Cause 3,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

_x0032_46.name: HT-6: A Two-Course Meal
_x0032_46.hint: As for medium tanks, you should be wary of their speed and maneuverability, as they usually avoid direct combat. Always monitor the minimap to quickly react to a medium tank's unexpected arrival.
_x0032_46.description: Most heavy tanks have extremely thick armor on the front. If you cannot flank them, try hitting the spots where the frontal armor is the thinnest. Weak spots usually include hatches, observation devices, the commander's cupola, and the lower glacis plate.

primary.conditions: • Participate in a successful capture of a base or reset the enemy capture points of your/neutral base • Cause 4,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 4 enemy vehicles

_x0032_47.name: HT-7: I've Got It Covered
_x0032_47.hint: Be careful when approaching the enemy base—get ready for a "warm" reception. If you prefer defensive tactics, make use of the terrain to find the best concealment and vantage points, which you can use to defend your own base (or the neutral base in an Encounter Battle) against the approaching enemy.
_x0032_47.description: Heavy tanks are great for breakthrough tactics. Punch through the enemy defensive lines and capture their base. However, do not underestimate your enemy—they might employ the same strategy.

primary.conditions: • Cause 3,000 HP of damage to enemy heavy tanks

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 5 enemy vehicles

_x0032_48.name: HT-8: With Guns Blazing
_x0032_48.hint: As a heavy tank, you are the backbone of your team. Enemy heavy tanks are just as important. Take them on and try to destroy them first, or at least keep them busy for as long as possible.
_x0032_48.description: Remember, your armor is your key strength. Cause as much damage as possible while your opponents enjoy the non-penetration messages over and over again.

primary.conditions: • Destroy an enemy vehicle that is 1 tier higher than your vehicle by ramming

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0032_49.name: HT-9: A Crushing Blow
_x0032_49.hint: The driver's Controlled Impact skill and the Spall Liner equipment can significantly reduce the damage done to your vehicle by ramming, and, at the same time, increase the damage of your own ramming attacks.
_x0032_49.description: Close-quarters engagements often render you unable to reload in time. In this situation, finish an enemy off by ramming them! The weaker the enemy vehicle's armor at the point of impact, the more damage you will cause.

primary.conditions: • Finish the battle as the top player on both teams by damage caused

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_50.name: HT-10: A Weighty Argument
_x0032_50.hint: The heat of battle is exactly the time when your tank can show all it is worth. Your great armor protection, if used efficiently, will ensure survival even in an almost hopeless situation. The longer your tank survives in a battle, the more damage you can cause to the enemy.
_x0032_50.description: Keep your gun active and keep yourself alive as long as possible.

primary.conditions: • Cause 4,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles • At the end of the battle, have no injured crew members or damaged/destroyed internal modules

secondary.conditions: • Destroy 5 enemy vehicles

_x0032_51.name: HT-11: Not Even a Scratch!
_x0032_51.hint: Use a First Aid Kit or a Repair Kit if the enemy destroys a key module of your vehicle or injures a crew member.
_x0032_51.description: Every module destroyed and crew member injured can become a problem. Try to keep them as safe as possible when breaking through the enemy ranks.

primary.conditions: • Have total damage blocked by armor equal to or exceeding 3 times the hit points of your vehicle • Cause 3,000 HP of damage to enemy vehicles

secondary.conditions: • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base • Survive the battle

_x0032_52.name: HT-12: Sturdy Armor
_x0032_52.hint: As much as possible, present your front armor to the enemy and hide your flanks and weak spots. Angle your armor to increase its effectiveness.
_x0032_52.description: Your armor can block a great amount of damage if you use it well.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 4 vehicles during the first 3 minutes of battle

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_53.name: HT-13: Storm the Defense!
_x0032_53.hint: When playing as part of a Platoon, protect each other’s flanks and focus your fire on the enemy. Keep each other alive, tear into the enemy, and find a way to win the battle.
_x0032_53.description: A Platoon of well-coordinated heavy tanks can turn the tide of the most desperate battle. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Destroy 7 vehicles of 3 different types

secondary.conditions: • Survive the battle

_x0032_54.name: HT-14: Take that Hill!
_x0032_54.hint: Coordinate with your teammates and cover as much of the battlefield as possible with destructive fire.
_x0032_54.description: Destroy all types of enemy vehicles, stop them cold, and leave them with no hope of victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

primary.conditions: • Cause, receive, and block a total of 14,000 HP of damage

secondary.conditions: • Cause 25% of the total amount of damage caused by your team • Destroy all enemy vehicles / capture or defend the base

_x0032_55.name: HT-15: Tempered Steel
_x0032_55.hint: Act carefully. Survive! Try to protect your side and rear armor from enemy fire. Heavy tanks can carry almost every battle, that is why they are always high-value targets for enemy SPGs. Keep a cool head and do not let them pin you down.
_x0032_55.description: A heavy tank can hit hard, but it can also take a hit and keep battling. Engage the enemy and keep the pressure on.

_x0034_.description: A set of missions for all vehicle types to receive the Soviet Object 260 heavy tank.

_x0031_.description: Every campaign comprises several operations that contain numerous missions for all types of vehicles. You will receive a unique vehicle for completion of each operation.
_x0031_.name: The Long-Awaited Backup
